scripts.clean: rm -f dist/css/* && rm -f dist/js/* && rm -f dist/images/*
scripts.build-css:prod: npm run autoprefixer && npm run cssnano && rm dist/css/app.css && rm dist/css/app.css.map
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && npm run build-css:dev && npm run build-js:dev && npm run imagemin
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && npm run build-css:prod && npm run build-js:prod && npm run imagemin
